name: Room 324
description:
I developed this game as a student of Goldsmiths, University of London.

Please fill out this form if you were invited to play this game: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdoBdaxc1tak8Ew51ezmyA881UzJM3rIqO463C4...

If the game is laggy or buggy (unity webGL can be a pain sometimes) please download the game files from here:

Laptop Download: https://sandak1ng.itch.io/room-324-laptop?password=room324
